name: Titans Came from the Ray (EN)
description:
Half way through the XX century, four peaceful creatures that came from a ray lived in Hell's Creek mountains, ignored by mankind.

Until the army found in their nest the key to end the soviet threat for good.

For decades, the american people would regret the consecuences of that lousy militar strategy against communism.

--------------------------------------------------

  • Embody four mythical creatures created by the special effects titan Ray Harryhausen.
  • Move through some not-so-well-known US cities devastating eveything on your path.
  • Destroy urban furniture worth billions of dollars like gas stations, parking lots of abandoned buildings.
  • Visit Atlantic City in 1955, Carson City in 1958, Santa Cruz in 1966 and Nashville in 1981 in virtual recreations that have absolutely nothing to do with the real thing.

An official video game for the Isla Calavera, the Canary Islands Fantastic Film Festival, created by Playmedusa.

--------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD

Move: arrows
Dash: move + x
Attack: space
Roar: shift / shout to mic

GAMEPAD
Move: left stick
Dash: move + East button
Attack: south button
Roar: north button / shout to mic


Need more destruction?

Download "An American Werewolf in L.A." now, Isla Calavera Film Festival's official game in 2019.
